title: EnvrinGroup
author: EnvrinGroup
content: https://crates.io/crates/utxo-scannerhttps://github.com/mdizak/rust-utxo-scannerNothing overly special, but just something I needed for something else I'm working on. Works fine, reads through the chainstate LevelDB from Bitcoin Core, and extracts all UTXOs into a RocksDB, CSV file or both.If you by chance need all the UTXOs in a readable and workable format though, this should do the trick.
